about_the_game:
GAME FEATURES

Embark on a Unique Adventure

Step into an Eastern-inspired wasteland overworld. Brave the dangers of what remains of civilization, exploring every zone in search of the Core of Creation. Immerse yourself in a rich storyline with diverse equipment and a robust talent system at your disposal.


Find Your Combat Style

Ashfall features 9 distinct shooting styles, each born from a unique blend of talents, equipment, and visceral shooting mechanics. Let nothing stand in your way as you dual-wield machine guns for maximum suppression power, shoot with confidence with the Mozambique drill technique for maximum accuracy, go for a sneakier approach with the stealth style, or choose a more unconventional option. With 9 styles to discover and play around with, you’ll find your ideal way to roam and conquer the wasteland.


Encounter Friends and Foes

The wasteland needs not to be a lonely place. Fortunately for you, you can team up with your friends, build your guild, and undertake uniquely designed challenges, together! But be aware – you may also face off against other Wanderers in blood-pumping PvP zones.


Explore the Secret Realms

For Wanderers who want to venture beyond the boundaries of the overworld, there is more to experience in the Secret Realms, with expansive territories (over 200km!) to explore. You will find intricate puzzles, intense combat events, and many challenging medium- and large-sized bases waiting to be occupied. With a high degree of freedom and combat strategy, the Secret Realms promise a unique gaming experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/10 (latest service pack)
  • Processor: Intel core i5-6400 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 280 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct11
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: AI has risen and launched a nuclear war against humanity. As ashes descend upon the ruins of civilization, you are tasked with leaving the safety of your vault to find the key to saving the world. Take up arms in this post-apocalyptic looter shooter and claim back what once was ours!
